def sort_it(list_, n):    
    return ', '.join(sorted(list_.split(', '), key=lambda i: i[n-1]))

def sort_it(words, i):
    return ", ".join(sorted(words.split(", "), key=lambda w: w[i-1]))

def sort_it(a, n):
    return ", ".join(sorted(a.split(", "), key=lambda x: x[n-1]))

def sort_it(s, n):
   return ', '.join(sorted(s.split(', '), key=lambda s: s[n-1]))
